SettlingIn/speak Robin "你好！你就是@吧。#$b#我叫羅賓，是這裡的木匠。是鎮長劉易斯派我來送你去你的新家的。他本人已經在那裡為你打掃屋子了。#$b#農場就在那邊，跟我來吧。"/viewport move 0 2 800/move Robin 0 5 2 true/pause 800/move farmer 0 4 2 true/fade/speed farmer 2/viewport -200 -200/changeLocation Farm/halt/warp Robin 78 17/faceDirection Robin 3/warp farmer 79 17/faceDirection farmer 3/viewport 70 16 clamp/viewport move -1 0 4000/move Robin -8 0 3 farmer -8 0 3/pause 700/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Robin "這裡就是 %farm農場。"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame 94/jump farmer/startJittering/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/showFrame 0/stopJittering/pause 800/faceDirection Robin 1/pause 200/speak Robin "怎麼了？#$b#雖說是長滿了雜草，但是下面的泥土可是很肥沃的！#$b#只要有點耐心，肯定很快就能清理乾淨它的。"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 200/move Robin -7 0 0 farmer -7 0 0/pause 400/faceDirection Robin 0/speak Robin "……鐺鐺鐺鐺，這就是你的新房子了。$h"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Lewis 64 15/pause 1500/speak Lewis "啊，新來的農夫到了！$h"/move Lewis 0 1 2/move Lewis 1 0 2/move Lewis 0 1 3/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Robin 1/pause 600/speak Lewis "歡迎！我叫劉易斯，是星露谷的鎮長。#$b#你不知道，很多人都對你很好奇。#$b#因為這裡很少有人搬進來的，所以你瞬間成了大家的關注對象！"/pause 1000/faceDirection Lewis 3/pause 100/faceDirection Lewis 0/pause 500/speak Lewis "那麼…………你是搬來你祖父的老房子。#$b#那是間很好的屋子……很有“鄉土味”。"/pause 300/faceDirection Robin 0 true/faceDirection farmer 0/viewport move 0 -1 2000/pause 3000/speak Robin "鄉土味？真是個糟糕的形容詞……$4#$b#'頑固'還差不多。$4"/faceDirection Lewis 3 true/jump Lewis/shake Lewis 1600/textAboveHead Lewis "太無禮了！"/showFrame Lewis 24/pause 500/faceDirection Robin 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection Robin 2 true/pause 100/animate Robin false true 100 32 33/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/showFrame Lewis 12/stopAnimation Robin/pause 300/faceDirection Robin 1/showFrame Lewis 12/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Lewis "別聽她說的， @。她只是想誘惑你購買她的房屋升級服務。$u"/showFrame Lewis 12/showFrame Robin 19/shake Robin 800/pause 1200/showFrame Robin 0/pause 600/animate Robin false true 300 34 35/textAboveHead Robin "嗯。"/pause 1500/speak Lewis "話說……你趕了那麼遠的路一定很累了。你該去休息一下了。#$b#明天你得到鎮上走走認識些人。#$b#鎮民們都很想認識你。"/move Lewis 4 0 1 true/viewport move 1 0 2000/pause 3000/proceedPosition Lewis/faceDirection Lewis 0/pause 500/faceDirection Lewis 3/speak Lewis "哦，差點忘了。如果你有想出售的東西，放在這個盒子裡就行。我每晚都會過來收走。#$b#那麼……祝你好運！"/pause 300/move Lewis 8 0 1 true/faceDirection farmer 0/stopAnimation Robin/advancedMove Robin false 0 1 2 0 0 -1 5 0/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic none/pause 2000/playSound rooster/pause 1000/end beginGame
